Question & Options:
Which songs are part of the soundtrack for the movie *Munna Bhai M.B.B.S.*?
Options:
A. chann chann
B. dekhle aankhon mein aankhien daal (remix)
C. subha ho gayee mamu
D. All of the above

Which songs are part of the Munna Bhai M.B.B.S. soundtrack and who composed the music for them?
Options:
A. A) chann chann
B. B) m bole to
C. C) subha ho gayee mamu
D. D) All of the above

Which statements are true regarding the songs and their composers from the movie *Munna Bhai M.B.B.S.* and the film *LOC: Kargil*?
Options:
A. A) 'dekhle aankhon mein aankhien daal' and 'm bole to' are both from the *Munna Bhai M.B.B.S.* soundtrack.
B. B) Anu Malik composed the soundtrack for *LOC: Kargil*.
C. C) 'subha ho gayee mamu' features vocals by Vinod Rathod.
D. D) All songs mentioned are from the *Munna Bhai M.B.B.S.* soundtrack.
Correct Answer: A) 'dekhle aankhon mein aankhien daal' and 'm bole to' are both from the *Munna Bhai M.B.B.S.* soundtrack., B) Anu Malik composed the soundtrack for *LOC: Kargil*.
